mapper.insert: insert into BOARD(MNUMBER, KINDOFBOARD, TITLE, CONTENT, CHECKPUBLIC) values (#{mNumber}, #{kindOfBoard}, #{title}, #{content}, #{checkPublic})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from BOARD
KINDOFBOARD = #{kindOfBoard}
and TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and (TITLE like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or CONTENT like '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
and (MNUMBER in ( select MNUMBER from MEMBER where NAME like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'))
select M.NAME from BOARD B inner join MEMBER M on B.MNUMBER = M.MNUMBER where B.BNUMBER = #{pk}
select M.ID from BOARD B inner join MEMBER M on B.MNUMBER = M.MNUMBER where B.BNUMBER = #{pk}
